title: PhD-student Integrated electric powertrains for the next generation EVs
field: Electrical Engineering, Electronics, Engineering Physics, Mechanical Engineering,
job_description: Ghent University is a top 100 university worldwide and one of the major universities in Belgium, with more than 44,000 students and 15,000 staff members. At the department of Electromechanical, Systems and Metal Engineering (ESME), the design and multiphysics modeling of electrical machines and power electronics is an important research topic.
employer_description: Ghent University is one of the top 100 universities in the Dutch language area, with more than 44,000 students and 15,000 staff members.
